entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence The United States accounts for about 4.25% of the world population but we account for over 25% of the COVID-19 world deaths.  But this administration says its doing a great job.  This is why Trump has so many failed businesses.  Horrible leader. https://t.co/4USj0lHKYR
